text: Ezɨ gavmanɨn faragha zuir gumazir kaba ko, Daniel ko ingangarir vamɨram amimning, me nɨghnɨzir kam gifongezir puvatɨ. Egha me Danielɨn ingangarimɨn aven gari, a bizitam pazɨva a damightɨ, me a kot darɨgham. Me garima, Daniel a gumazir bar aghuim, egha an ingangarim bar dera. A ifarir puvatɨgha arazir kuratam gamizir puvatɨ, kamaghɨn amizɨ, me an arazir kuratamɨn apizir puvatɨ.
